reviews.text: I love the way they updated everything around the 🚆 station. Now you have Sainsbury's 2min by walk from the train station, holiday Inn and 10 min by walk to town.
Last Thursday I travelled to Southport, via Salford Crescent. The staff at Stockport were extremly helpful, as I needed assistance to board the train. So I would like to say thank you.

Small station of around 5 platforms (1 to 4 and platform zero) with good connections, to the North, South east and west - staff helpful and has the usual shops and cafes

Information boards are good and ticket office is available too

Changed here for the frequent service to Buxton

Really helpful and friendly staff at this station. Especially Kevin the platform guard and his colleague. I was trying to get to Liver pool Lime Street on quickest route and both really helped me out. Great station staff. Thank You

They turn the entrance to taxis only. And the back entrance which is where only taxis uses like wild animals and just sit in the road. Scum thank you Stockport for doing nothing apart from making everyone's journey a little worse
